title: "I am totally opposed to domestic violence of any kind": Trump
text:
"I am totally opposed to domestic violence of any kind": Trump Wednesday, February 14, 2018 - 00:34 
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he is opposed to domestic violence, speaking out on the matter a week after top aide Rob Porter resigned under the weight of allegations from two former wives that he committed domestic abuse. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
